price: 66. Welee! Maar aanbid slechts Allah en behoor tot de dankbaren.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
